QuestData.Title: Pearlescent Shell
QuestData.Description:
<A large, hardened shell of a vanquished hermit crab.
The shell itself was much larger than the crab, and shines in different colors when you look at it at different angles.
Surely someone back at Newhome would be interested in this beautiful shell.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Show the Pearlescent Shell to Finder Palta in Newhome in Nazjatar.
